56957.ja: <voice 00130_00056957><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「失礼いたします。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56959.en:
It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Grand Priestess. My name is Anlucia, princess of the Kingdom of
Gran Zedora.
56959.ja:
<voice 00368_00056959><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「お初に　お目にかかります　大神官さま。
　私は　グランゼドーラ王国の王女
　アンルシアと申します。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56959.ko:
<voice 00368_00056959><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 처음 뵙겠습니다, 대신관님.
　전 그랑제도라 왕국의 공주
　안루시아라 합니다.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56959.zh-Hans:
<voice 00368_00056959><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>初次见面，大神官阁下。
我是古兰泽朵拉王国的公主，
我叫安露西雅。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56959.zh-Hant:
<voice 00368_00056959><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>初次見面，大神官大人。
我是古蘭澤朵拉王國的公主
安露西亞。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56960.en:
<voice 00410_00056960><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Hooo... So you are Hero Princess
Anlucia. And what brings you to this
temple?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56960.ja:
<voice 00410_00056960><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「ほほう……。
　そなたが　勇者姫アンルシアか。
　して　何用があって　この神殿へ来たのじゃ？<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56960.ko:
<voice 00410_00056960><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 오오…….
　그대가 용사 공주 안루시아로군.
　헌데 이 신전에는 무슨 일이지?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56960.zh-Hans:
<voice 00410_00056960><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>哦哦……
你就是勇者公主安露西雅啊。
你来这个神殿是有什么事吗？<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56960.zh-Hant:
<voice 00410_00056960><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>喔……
妳就是勇者公主安露西亞啊。
妳來這神殿有什麼事嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56961.en:
I am here to protect Divine Crimsonite, the keystone that protects Lendersia. The Scarlet Stone is now
being targeted by the Great Demon King.
56961.ja:
<voice 00512_00056961><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「私は　レンダーシアを守護する要石……
　神の緋石を守るため　ここに　参りました。
　緋石は今　大魔王に狙われているのです。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56961.ko:
<voice 00512_00056961><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 전 렌더시아를 수호하는 중추석……
　신의 붉은 돌을 지키기 위해 여기 왔습니다.
　지금 대마왕이 그 붉은 돌을 노리고 있어요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56961.zh-Hans:
<voice 00512_00056961><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我是为了保护神之绯石……
也就是守护冷达西亚的关键而来。
大魔王现在盯上了绯石。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56961.zh-Hant:
<voice 00512_00056961><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我是為了守護神之緋石……
也就是保護冷達西亞的核心關鍵而來。
大魔王已經盯上緋石了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56962.en:
<voice 00542_00056962><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Alltrades Abbey is considered a holy
place in Lendersia. It may be the site
of a Divine Crimsonite.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56962.ja:
<voice 00542_00056962><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「このダーマ神殿は　レンダーシアにおいて
　聖なる場所と　あがめられています。
　もしかしたら　神の緋石があるのではないかと。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56962.ko:
<voice 00542_00056962><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 이곳 다마 신전은 렌더시아 내에서
　특히 신성한 곳으로 여겨지는 장소이니
　어쩌면 신의 붉은 돌이 있지 않을까 해서요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56962.zh-Hans:
<voice 00542_00056962><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>这个达玛神殿在冷达西亚
被尊崇为神圣之地。
我猜神之绯石也许在这里。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56962.zh-Hant:
<voice 00542_00056962><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>達瑪神殿在冷達西亞中
是神聖之地。
我想神之緋石也可能會在這裡。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56963.en:
<voice 00582_00056963><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>...I don't know anything about Divine
Crimsonite, but it may have something
to do with the dream I had.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56963.ja:
<voice 00582_00056963><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……むむむ。神の緋石とやらのことは知らんが
　わしの見た夢と　関係があるやもしれんな……。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56963.ko:
<voice 00582_00056963><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……으음, 신의 붉은 돌이란 건 모르겠네만
　내가 꾼 꿈과 관련이 있을 수도 있겠군…….<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56963.zh-Hans:
<voice 00582_00056963><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……嗯嗯嗯。我虽然不知道什么神之绯石，
但是也许和我做的梦有关……<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56963.zh-Hant:
<voice 00582_00056963><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>呣呣呣……我不知道什麼神之緋石，
但和我的夢也許有關……<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56964.en:
At the back of this temple, in a place called the Divine Seat, is the Avatar of Alltrades. I had a dream that
someone was destroying it.
56964.ja:
<voice 00617_00056964><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「この神殿の奥。天願の座と呼ばれる場所に
　ダーマのご神体が　納められておる。わしは
　それが何者かに　壊される夢を見たのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56964.ko:
<voice 00617_00056964><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 이 신전 안쪽에 있는 소원의 방이란 곳에
　다마의 영물이 봉납되어 있네만
　누군가 그걸 파괴하는 꿈을 꿨지 뭔가.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56964.zh-Hans:
<voice 00617_00056964><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>在这个神殿的深处，有个叫天愿之座的地方，
达玛的圣物就收藏在那里。
我梦见圣物被什么人给破坏了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56964.zh-Hant:
<voice 00617_00056964><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>在這座神殿深處，有一個叫做天願之座的地方，
供奉著達瑪的聖物。我夢見了
那聖物被某人破壞的夢。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56965.en:
<voice 00710_00056965><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>...I see. The Divine Crimsonite may be
the very body of the Goddess.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56965.ja:
<voice 00710_00056965><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「……なるほど。そのご神体こそが
　神の緋石なのかも　しれません。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56965.ko:
<voice 00710_00056965><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: ……그렇군요, 어쩌면 그 영물이
　신의 붉은 돌일지도 모르겠어요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56965.zh-Hans:
<voice 00710_00056965><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……原来如此。那个圣物
也许就是神之绯石。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56965.zh-Hant:
<voice 00710_00056965><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……原來如此，那聖物
也許就是神之緋石。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56966.en:
<voice 00750_00056966><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>I was curious about the dream. I was
going to visit the Divine Seat to
check on the safety of the deity.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56966.ja:
<voice 00750_00056966><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「どうにも　その夢が気になってのう。
　わしは　ご神体の無事を確認するため
　天願の座に　おもむくつもりだったのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56966.ko:
<voice 00750_00056966><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 그 꿈이 영 마음에 걸려서 말일세.
　영물이 무사한지 확인하기 위해
　소원의 방에 가려던 참이었다네.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56966.zh-Hans:
<voice 00750_00056966><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>那个梦实在让我很担心。
为了确认圣物平安无事，
我正准备去天愿之座。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56966.zh-Hant:
<voice 00750_00056966><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>我很在意這個夢。
為了確認聖物安然無恙，
我想去看看天願之座。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000198.en:
<voice 00790_29000198><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>That's just great. Would you mind if I
and Hero's ally, <pc>,
accompany you?<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000198.ja:
<voice 00790_29000198><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「それは　ちょうど　よかった。
　私と　勇者の盟友である　<pc>も
　同行させて　いただけないでしょうか？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000198.ko:
<voice 00790_29000198><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 마침 잘됐네요.
　저와 용사의 맹우인 <pc>도
　함께 가도 될까요?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000198.zh-Hans:
<voice 00790_29000198><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那正好，
可以让我和勇者的盟友<pc>
也一起同行吗？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000198.zh-Hant:
<voice 00790_29000198><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那正好，
可以讓我和勇者的盟友<pc>
也一起同行嗎？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000199.en:
<voice 00790_29000199><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>That's just great. Would you mind if I
and Hero's ally, <pc>,
accompany you?<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000199.ja:
<voice 00790_29000199><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「それは　ちょうど　よかった。
　私と　勇者の盟友である　<pc>も
　同行させて　いただけないでしょうか？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000199.ko:
<voice 00790_29000199><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 마침 잘됐네요.
　저와 용사의 맹우인 <pc>도
　함께 가도 될까요?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000199.zh-Hans:
<voice 00790_29000199><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那正好，
可以让我和勇者的盟友<pc>
也一起同行吗？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000199.zh-Hant:
<voice 00790_29000199><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那正好，
可以讓我和勇者的盟友<pc>
也一起同行嗎？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56968.en: <voice 00900_00056968><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Oh, my! This man was Hero's ally?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56968.ja: <voice 00900_00056968><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「なんと！　この者は　勇者の盟友であったのか。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56968.ko: <voice 00900_00056968><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 뭐라!? 이자가 용사의 맹우였단 말인가?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56968.zh-Hans: <voice 00900_00056968><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>什么！这位就是勇者的盟友啊。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56968.zh-Hant: <voice 00900_00056968><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>什麼！他是勇者的盟友嗎！<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56969.en:
By infusing the power of my Hero, Divine Crimsonite will regain the power of the age of the Gods, and will
be impervious to the evil ones.
56969.ja:
<voice 00940_00056969><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「私の持つ　勇者のチカラを注ぎ込むことで
　神の緋石は　神代の時代のチカラを取り戻し
　悪しき者を寄せ付けなくなるはずです。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56969.ko:
<voice 00940_00056969><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 제가 지닌 용사의 힘을 불어넣으면
　신의 붉은 돌이 신대의 힘을 되찾아
　사악한 자가 접근할 수 없게 될 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56969.zh-Hans:
<voice 00940_00056969><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>将我的勇者之力注入神之绯石中，
绯石就能恢复神代时代的力量，
恶人便无法靠近。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56969.zh-Hant:
<voice 00940_00056969><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>只要注入我的勇者之力，
讓神之緋石取回神代之時的力量，
惡人應該就無法靠近了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56970.en:
<voice 00980_00056970><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Oh. Then there is no reason to refuse.
I would even ask you to accompany me.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56970.ja:
<voice 00980_00056970><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「おお。それならば　断る理由はない。
　わしからも　同行をお願いしたいくらいじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56970.ko:
<voice 00980_00056970><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 오오, 그렇다면 마다할 이유가 없지.
　오히려 동행을 부탁하고 싶을 정도일세.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56970.zh-Hans:
<voice 00980_00056970><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>哦哦。既然这样我就没有理由拒绝了。
你们能一起来我求之不得。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56970.zh-Hant:
<voice 00980_00056970><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>喔喔，那我可沒拒絕的理由。
我也想和你們一同前往。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56971.en:
We will soon perform the ritual of opening the entrance to the Divine Seat. Please make your way to the
Ritual Hall on the basement floor.
56971.ja:
<voice 01022_00056971><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「天願の座の入り口を開く　祈りの儀を
　すぐに　とりおこなうとしよう。
　地下１階の　儀式の間に向かってくれるかの。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56971.ko:
<voice 01022_00056971><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 지금 바로 소원의 방 입구를 여는
　기도 의식을 올리기로 하지.
　지하 1층에 있는 의식의 방으로 와 주겠나?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56971.zh-Hans:
<voice 01022_00056971><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>我马上就进行
打开天愿之座入口的祈祷仪式。
你们先去地下１楼的仪式之室吧。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56971.zh-Hant:
<voice 01022_00056971><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>我來打開天願之座的入口，
儘快開始祈禱的儀式。
你們能來地下１樓的儀式之間嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56972.en:
<voice 01062_00056972><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Thank you for your cooperation, Grand
Priest. Now we will go to the Ritual
Hall.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56972.ja:
<voice 01062_00056972><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ご協力に感謝いたします　大神官さま。
　では　私たちは　儀式の間へ向かいます。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56972.ko:
<voice 01062_00056972><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 협력해 주셔서 감사합니다, 대신관님.
　그럼 저희는 의식의 방으로 가겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56972.zh-Hans:
<voice 01062_00056972><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>感谢您的合作，大神官阁下。
那我们就先去仪式之室了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56972.zh-Hant:
<voice 01062_00056972><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>感謝幫忙，大神官大人。
我們這就前往儀式之間。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56975.en:
<voice 00365_00056975><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Hero Princess, and <pc>.
Sorry to keep you waiting.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56975.ja:
<voice 00365_00056975><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「勇者姫　それに　<pc>よ。
　待たせて　すまんかったのう。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56975.ko:
<voice 00365_00056975><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 용사 공주, 그리고 <pc>.
　기다리게 해서 미안하군.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56975.zh-Hans:
<voice 00365_00056975><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>勇者公主和<pc>。
抱歉让你们久等了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56975.zh-Hant:
<voice 00365_00056975><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>勇者公主，還有<pc>，
抱歉讓你們久等了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56976.en:
<voice 00485_00056976><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>We will perform the prayer service
immediately. You two, stand back.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56976.ja:
<voice 00485_00056976><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「さっそく　祈りの儀を　とりおこなうでな。
　おふたりは　下がっておられよ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56976.ko:
<voice 00485_00056976><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 바로 기도 의식을 올릴 테니
　두 사람은 물러나 있게.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56976.zh-Hans:
<voice 00485_00056976><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>那就赶快开始祈祷仪式吧。
二位请后退。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56976.zh-Hant:
<voice 00485_00056976><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>現在就開始祈禱儀式吧。
請你們先退開一點。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56977.en: <voice 00795_00056977><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>...Juaro, Purifying Flame.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56977.ja: <voice 00795_00056977><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……ジュアロよ。浄化の種火を。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56977.ko: <voice 00795_00056977><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……주알로, 정화의 불씨를 준비하게.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56977.zh-Hans: <voice 00795_00056977><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……玖艾洛啊。拿净化火种来。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56977.zh-Hant: <voice 00795_00056977><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……玖艾洛啊，拿淨化火種來。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56978.ja: <voice 00842_00056978><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「ははあっ……。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56979.en:
<voice 01416_00056979><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>...Ooh, heavens! I hope and I pray. Guide me
to the throne. Let my wish be
delivered to the throne.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56979.ja:
<voice 01416_00056979><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……おお　天よ。我は願い　我は祈る。
　我を　その座に　導きたまえー。
　その座に　願いを届けさせたまえーい。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56979.ko:
<voice 01416_00056979><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……오오, 하늘이시여. 바라옵고 기도하건대
　절 그 방으로 인도해 주소서.
　그 방에 제 소원이 닿게 해 주소서.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56979.zh-Hans:
<voice 01416_00056979><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>啊，上天啊。我恳求，我祈祷。
将我引导向天愿之座吧。
将我的愿望传向那里吧。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56979.zh-Hant:
<voice 01416_00056979><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>喔喔，蒼天啊……我向您許願，向您祈禱。
指引我到天願之座去吧。
讓我的願望傳達到天願之座去吧。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56980.en:
<voice 01992_00056980><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>...The door was opened by the ritual of
prayer.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56980.ja: <voice 01992_00056980><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……祈りの儀により　扉は開いた。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56980.ko: <voice 01992_00056980><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……기도 의식으로 문이 열렸네.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56980.zh-Hans: <voice 01992_00056980><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……门已经通过祈祷仪式打开了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56980.zh-Hant: <voice 01992_00056980><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……透過祈禱儀式打開了門。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56981.en:
<voice 02034_00056981><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Let us go to the Divine Seat. All of
you, follow me.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56981.ja:
<voice 02034_00056981><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「それでは　天願の座へ　おもむこう。
　皆の者　わしについてまいれ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56981.ko:
<voice 02034_00056981><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 그럼 소원의 방으로 가지.
　모두 날 따라오게.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56981.zh-Hans:
<voice 02034_00056981><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>那我们就去天愿之座吧。
各位请跟在我后面。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56981.zh-Hant:
<voice 02034_00056981><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>那我們就去天願之座吧。
各位，跟我來。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56982.en:
<voice 02424_00056982><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001><pc> We should go. If there
is a Divine Crimsonite, we need to
infuse it with the power of Hero.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56982.ja:
<voice 02424_00056982><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<pc>　私たちも　行きましょう。
　神の緋石があるなら　勇者のチカラを
　注ぎ込まないと　いけないわ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56982.ko:
<voice 02424_00056982><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 우리도 가자.
　신의 붉은 돌이 있다면
　용사의 힘을 불어넣어야 해.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56982.zh-Hans:
<voice 02424_00056982><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><pc>，我们也走吧。
如果有神之绯石的话，
就需要向里面注入勇者之力。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56982.zh-Hant:
<voice 02424_00056982><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><pc>，我們也走吧。
要是神之緋石真的在那，
我得注入勇者之力才行。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56983.en:
<voice 00180_00056983><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Look.<cs_pchero>I knew it. I knew Avatar of Alltrades
was Divine Crimsonite. Looks like he's
still in one piece.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56983.ja:
<voice 00180_00056983><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「見て　<cs_pchero>。
　やはり　ダーマのご神体は　神の緋石だったわ。
　どうやら　まだ無事のようね。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56983.ko:
<voice 00180_00056983><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 저걸 봐, <cs_pchero>.
　역시 다마의 영물이 신의 붉은 돌이었어.
　보아하니 아직 무사한 것 같아.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56983.zh-Hans:
<voice 00180_00056983><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>看啊，<cs_pchero>。
达玛的圣物果然就是神之绯石。
看来还没出什么事。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56983.zh-Hant:
<voice 00180_00056983><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，你看！
達瑪的聖物果然就是神之緋石。
看來它還安然無事。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56984.en:
<voice 00270_00056984><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>...Ahh. Indeed, the deity was Divine
Crimsonite.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56984.ja:
<voice 00270_00056984><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……ああ。確かに　ご神体は
　神の緋石であったようじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56984.ko:
<voice 00270_00056984><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……그렇군, 역시 영물이
　신의 붉은 돌이었던 모양일세.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56984.zh-Hans:
<voice 00270_00056984><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……啊。看起来圣物确实是
神之绯石啊。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56984.zh-Hant:
<voice 00270_00056984><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……是啊，看來聖物
確實是神之緋石。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56985.en:
<voice 00520_00056985><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>The scarlet stone has lost much of its
luster. Let's pour Hero's power into
it now.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56985.ja:
<voice 00520_00056985><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「緋石の輝きが　かなり落ちているわ。
　今すぐに　勇者のチカラを注ぎ込みましょう。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56985.ko:
<voice 00520_00056985><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 붉은 돌의 빛이 많이 약해졌어.
　지금 당장 용사의 힘을 불어넣어야겠어.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56985.zh-Hans:
<voice 00520_00056985><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>绯石的光芒已经黯淡了许多，
赶快注入勇者之力吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56985.zh-Hant:
<voice 00520_00056985><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>緋石已經十分黯淡了，
我馬上來注入勇者之力吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56986.en:
<voice 00620_00056986><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Then you will be all right. I'm really
glad that the dream you had didn't
come true, Mr. Opriest.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56986.ja:
<voice 00620_00056986><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「そうすれば　もう大丈夫です。
　大神官さまの見た夢が　現実にならなくて
　本当に　よかったですね。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56986.ko:
<voice 00620_00056986><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그러면 이제 괜찮을 거예요.
　대신관님이 꾸신 꿈이 현실이 되지 않아서
　정말 다행이에요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56986.zh-Hans:
<voice 00620_00056986><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那样一来就没问题了。
大神官阁下的梦不会变成现实，
真是太好了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56986.zh-Hant:
<voice 00620_00056986><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>這樣應該就沒問題了。
大神官大人的惡夢沒實現，
真是太好了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56987.en:
<voice 00710_00056987><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>...What do you think about that? The
dream will only become a reality in
the future!<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56987.ja:
<voice 00710_00056987><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……それは　どうでございましょうねえ？
　夢が現実となるのは　これからなのですから！<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56987.ko:
<voice 00710_00056987><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……그건 과연 어떨까요?
　꿈이 현실이 되는 건 지금부터니까요!<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56987.zh-Hans:
<voice 00710_00056987><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……这可不好说啊？
梦正要从现在开始变成现实呢！<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56987.zh-Hant:
<voice 00710_00056987><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……那可難說喔？
因為夢從現在才要開始變成現實！<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56988.ja: <voice 00848_00056988><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「大神官さま　何を！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56988.ko: <voice 00848_00056988><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 대신관님, 이게 무슨!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56988.zh-Hans: <voice 00848_00056988><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>大神官阁下，您做什么？！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56988.zh-Hant: <voice 00848_00056988><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>大神官大人，你做什麼！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56989.en:
I never thought I would face Divine Crimsonite with Hero and his allies... I am very happy to say that it was a
miscalculation.
56989.ja:
<voice 00893_00056989><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「まさか　勇者とその盟友を引き連れて
　神の緋石と　対面することになろうとは……。
　いやはや　うれしい誤算と言えましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56989.ko:
<voice 00893_00056989><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 설마 용사와 그 맹우를 데리고
　신의 붉은 돌과 대면하게 될 줄이야…….
　이것 참, 반가운 오산이군요.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56989.zh-Hans:
<voice 00893_00056989><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>没想到会带着勇者和盟友
来到神之绯石这里……
哎呀哎呀，这可真是意外的收获啊。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56989.zh-Hant:
<voice 00893_00056989><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>沒想到我竟會帶勇者和其盟友
來見神之緋石……
哎呀，算是誤打誤撞吧。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56990.en:
What luck to be able to make the Divine Crimsonite and all those who stood in the way of our efforts to get
rid of them! And what an honor!
56990.ja:
<voice 00968_00056990><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「神の緋石もろとも　邪魔者どもを
　亡き者にできるとは　なんたる幸運！
　そして　なんたる光栄！！<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56990.ko:
<voice 00968_00056990><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 신의 붉은 돌과 함께 방해꾼까지
　처리할 수 있다니 이렇게 운이 좋을 데가!
　이렇게 영광스러울 데가!!<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56990.zh-Hans:
<voice 00968_00056990><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>能将神之绯石和碍事的家伙们
一起消灭，这是多么的幸运！
多么的光荣啊！<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56990.zh-Hant:
<voice 00968_00056990><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>不管是神之緋石還是誰，
能殺了妨礙我的傢伙都是何等幸運！
又是何等光榮！！<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56991.en: <voice 01008_00056991><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>The Great Priest!?<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56991.ja: <voice 01008_00056991><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「大神官さま！？<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56991.zh-Hans: <voice 01008_00056991><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>大神官阁下？！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56991.zh-Hant: <voice 01008_00056991><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>大神官大人！？<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56992.en:
<voice 01308_00056992><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>Kukukku! Nice to meet you all. My name
is Phasma, or as I prefer to be
called, Phantom General Phasma.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56992.ja:
<voice 01308_00056992><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「クククククッ！　皆さま　はじめまして。
　私の名は　ファズマ。
　幻魔将ファズマと　お呼びいただきたい。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56992.ko:
<voice 01308_00056992><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 큭큭큭큭큭! 여러분, 반갑습니다.
　제 이름은 파즈마.
　환마장 파즈마라 불러 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56992.zh-Hans:
<voice 01308_00056992><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻嘻嘻！各位，初次见面。
我叫法兹马。
请叫我幻魔将法兹马。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56992.zh-Hant:
<voice 01308_00056992><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>呵呵呵呵呵！初次見面，
我的名字是法茲馬。
請稱我為幻魔將法茲馬。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56993.en:
<voice 01378_00056993><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>By order of Marshal Zeldrad, I have
come here to destroy the Divine
Crimsonite hidden in this land.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56993.ja:
<voice 01378_00056993><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「魔元帥ゼルドラドさまの命により
　この地に隠された　神の緋石を破壊しに
　参上つかまつった次第。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56993.ko:
<voice 01378_00056993><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 마원수 젤도라도 님의 명령에 따라
　이곳에 숨겨져 있는 신의 붉은 돌을
　파괴하러 왔답니다.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56993.zh-Hans:
<voice 01378_00056993><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>我是奉魔元帅杰尔德莱德之命
来破坏藏在此地的神之绯石。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56993.zh-Hant:
<voice 01378_00056993><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>我奉魔元帥傑爾德萊德大人的命，
前來破壞藏在此處的神之緋石。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56994.en:
<voice 01418_00056994><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>...Oh, no! I can't believe that the Great
Demon King's handlers were already
hiding in Alltrades Abbey!<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56994.ja:
<voice 01418_00056994><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「……そんな！？　すでに　大魔王の手の者が
　ダーマ神殿に　潜んでいたなんて！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56994.ko:
<voice 01418_00056994><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: ……그럴 수가!? 이미 대마왕의 수하가
　다마 신전에 숨어들었을 줄이야!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56994.zh-Hans:
<voice 01418_00056994><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……怎么会？！大魔王的手下
已经潜伏在达玛神殿里了！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56994.zh-Hant: <voice 01418_00056994><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……怎麼會！？大魔王的手下竟然在達瑪神殿臥底！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56995.en: <voice 01458_00056995><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>The... Great Priestess has turned into a monster!? Umm...<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56995.ja:
<voice 01458_00056995><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「だっ……大神官さまが　魔物に！？
　うーん……。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56995.ko:
<voice 01458_00056995><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 대…… 대신관님이 마물로!?
　아아…….<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56995.zh-Hans:
<voice 01458_00056995><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>大……大神官阁下是怪物？！
呜……<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56995.zh-Hant:
<voice 01458_00056995><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>大、大神官大人變成怪物了！？
嗯……<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56996.en:
My plan to use my illusionary powers to disguise myself as the Great Priest of Dharma and infiltrate the Divine
Crimsonite. It seems to have succeeded brilliantly.
56996.ja:
<voice 01533_00056996><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「変幻自在の幻術で　ダーマの大神官に化け
　神の緋石のもとへ侵入する　我が計画。
　見事に　成功のようでございますね。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56996.ko:
<voice 01533_00056996><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 이 변화무쌍한 환술로 다마 대신관으로 둔갑해
　신의 붉은 돌이 있는 곳에 잠입하는 게
　제 계획이었죠. 계획은 대성공인 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56996.zh-Hans:
<voice 01533_00056996><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>我利用可以自由变化的幻术，
伪装成大神官，潜入神之绯石所在之处。
看来我的这个计划非常成功啊。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56996.zh-Hant:
<voice 01533_00056996><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>使用變換自如的幻術偽裝成達瑪大神官，
侵入神之緋石的所在之處，就是我的計畫。
看來很成功嘛。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56997.en:
<voice 01624_00056997><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>There were a few silly people who
helped me without realizing it,
though. Cooke kook.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56997.ja:
<voice 01624_00056997><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「そうと気づかず　私のお手伝いをしてくれた
　おろかな方も　おられましたがねえ。
　クックククク……。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56997.ko:
<voice 01624_00056997><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 그런 줄도 모르고 절 도운
　어리석은 분도 계셨지만요.
　큭큭큭큭큭…….<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56997.zh-Hans:
<voice 01624_00056997><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>而且有个愚蠢的人完全没有
注意到这点，还给我帮了忙。
嘻嘻嘻嘻嘻……<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56997.zh-Hant:
<voice 01624_00056997><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>也多虧了毫無察覺的你們
幫了我大忙。
呵呵呵呵呵……<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56998.en:
Burying Divine Crimsonite and Hero in the darkness would truly kill two birds with one stone, and the Great
Demon King Madesagora would be very pleased!
56998.ja:
<voice 01664_00056998><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「勇者もろとも　神の緋石を闇に葬ってしまえば
　まさに　一石二鳥。大魔王マデサゴーラさまも
　さぞや　およろこびになりましょう！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56998.ko:
<voice 01664_00056998><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 용사와 함께 신의 붉은 돌까지 없애 버리면
　그야말로 일석이조. 대마왕 마데사고라 님도
　무척 기뻐하실 겁니다!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56998.zh-Hans:
<voice 01664_00056998><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>如果能将勇者和神之绯石一起消灭，
那可真是一石二鸟。
大魔王马蒂桑贡拉大人一定也会高兴的！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56998.zh-Hant:
<voice 01664_00056998><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>能將勇者一行人與神之緋石一同消滅，
簡直是一石二鳥。大魔王馬德沙葛拉大人
也一定會很高興的！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56999.en:
<voice 01704_00056999><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>I'll take him down and protect the
Divine Crimsonite!<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56999.ja:
<voice 01704_00056999><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>。
　こいつを倒して　神の緋石を守るわよ！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56999.ko:
<voice 01704_00056999><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>.
　이 녀석을 해치우고 신의 붉은 돌을 지키자!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56999.zh-Hans:
<voice 01704_00056999><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，
我们要打倒这家伙，保护神之绯石！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56999.zh-Hant:
<voice 01704_00056999><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，
打倒這傢伙，守護神之緋石吧！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57000.en:
<voice 01794_00057000><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>Kukukuk. You have a lot of pomp
and circumstance. But alas, you will
all meet a swift death.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57000.ja:
<voice 01794_00057000><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「クックックク。威勢のよろしいことで。
　しかし　残念ながら　あなた方は
　速やかなる　死を迎えるのでございます。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57000.ko:
<voice 01794_00057000><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 큭큭큭큭, 그 용기는 높이 사죠.
　하지만 안타깝게도 당신들은
　곧바로 죽게 될 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57000.zh-Hans:
<voice 01794_00057000><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻嘻。你们还真有气势。
不过非常遗憾，
你们马上就要死了。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57000.zh-Hant:
<voice 01794_00057000><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>呵呵呵呵，真愛說大話。
可惜，
你們很快就要死了。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57001.en:
<voice 01834_00057001><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>The brilliance of my illusion. See for
yourself!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57001.ja: <voice 01834_00057001><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「我が幻術の冴え。とくと　ご覧あれ！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57001.ko: <voice 01834_00057001><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 제 환상적인 환술을 똑똑히 맛보시죠!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57001.zh-Hans: <voice 01834_00057001><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>好好欣赏一下我的幻术有多高明吧！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57001.zh-Hant: <voice 01834_00057001><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>好好見識見識，我精湛的幻術吧！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57002.en:
<voice 01974_00057002><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>Unless you break this illusion, there
can be no victory for you!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57002.ja:
<voice 01974_00057002><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「この幻術を破らぬ限り　あなた方に
　勝利など　ありえないのでございます！
　ククク……クカカカカッ！！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57002.ko:
<voice 01974_00057002><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 이 환술을 깨지 못하는 한
　당신들에게 승리란 없습니다!
　큭큭큭…… 크하하하하!!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57002.zh-Hans:
<voice 01974_00057002><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>只要你们无法破除这个幻术，
就不可能战胜我！
嘻嘻嘻……嘻哈哈哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57002.zh-Hant:
<voice 01974_00057002><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>只要此幻術不破，
你們就毫無勝算！
呵呵呵……呵哈哈哈哈！！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57003.en:
<voice 00230_00057003><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Wait for me! I can't let you destroy
Divine Crimsonite!<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57003.ja:
<voice 00230_00057003><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「待ちなさい！　神の緋石を
　壊させるわけには　いかないわ！！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57003.ko:
<voice 00230_00057003><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 멈춰! 신의 붉은 돌을
　파괴하게 놔두지 않겠어!!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57003.zh-Hans:
<voice 00230_00057003><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>住手！我不能让你
破坏神之绯石！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57003.zh-Hant:
<voice 00230_00057003><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>等一下！我不能讓你
破壞神之緋石！！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57004.en:
<voice 00300_00057004><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>Oh yeah... It seems that Hero and his
ally have returned from the depths of
the yellow fountain.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57004.ja:
<voice 00300_00057004><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「おや……。死にぞこないの勇者と
　その盟友が　黄泉の淵から
　舞い戻ったようでございますね。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57004.ko:
<voice 00300_00057004><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 응……? 죽다 살아난 용사와
　그 맹우가 죽음의 심연에서
　기어나온 모양이로군요.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57004.zh-Hans:
<voice 00300_00057004><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>哦呀……捡了一条命的勇者和
她的盟友从黄泉里回来了啊。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57004.zh-Hant:
<voice 00300_00057004><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>喔……？看來打不死的勇者和其盟友，
從黃泉的深淵中
回歸了呢。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57005.en:
No matter how many times you come, it will be the same. Unless you break my illusion, there is no chance for you
to win.
57005.ja:
<voice 00410_00057005><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「何度　来ようとも　同じこと。
　我が幻術を破らない限り　あなた方に
　勝機など　ありはしないのでございます。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57005.ko:
<voice 00410_00057005><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 몇 번을 덤비든 똑같습니다.
　제 환술을 깨지 못하는 한
　당신들에게 승산은 없으니까요.<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57005.zh-Hans:
<voice 00410_00057005><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>不管回来几次结果都一样。
只要你们无法破除这个幻术，
就不可能战胜我！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57005.zh-Hant:
<voice 00410_00057005><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>不論幾次都一樣。
只要破不了我的幻術，
你們就毫無勝算。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57006.en:
<voice 00452_00057006><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, defend the Divine Crimsonite. Let's
defeat him at any cost!<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57006.ja:
<voice 00452_00057006><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>。神の緋石を　守り抜くのよ。
　なんとしても　こいつを倒しましょう！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57006.ko:
<voice 00452_00057006><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 신의 붉은 돌을 지키자.
　무슨 수를 써서라도 이 녀석을 해치우는 거야!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57006.zh-Hans:
<voice 00452_00057006><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，我们要保护神之绯石。
无论如何也要打倒这家伙！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57006.zh-Hant:
<voice 00452_00057006><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，一起來守護神之緋石吧。
不論發生什麼都要打倒這傢伙！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57007.en:
<voice 00492_00057007><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>Kukukuku... As usual, you are so dashing
and charming. But I would like to end
this time!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57007.ja:
<voice 00492_00057007><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「ククククッ……。相変わらず
　威勢がよくて　ほほえましいこと。
　ですが　今回で　終わりにしとうございます！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57007.ko:
<voice 00492_00057007><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: 큭큭큭큭…….
　여전히 용기 하나는 가상하군요.
　하지만 상대해 드리는 건 이게 마지막입니다!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57007.zh-Hans:
<voice 00492_00057007><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻……你们还是
这么有气势，真让我高兴。
但是这次就做个了结吧！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57007.zh-Hant:
<voice 00492_00057007><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>呵呵呵呵……還是一樣只會說大話，
真是笑死人了。
不過，這次就做個了結吧！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57008.en:
<voice 00110_00057008><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>...GAAAAH!? What a thing to say! I never
thought that my illusion would be
broken!!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57008.ja:
<voice 00110_00057008><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「……カァァァッ！？
　なんということで　ございましょう！
　我が幻術が　破られてしまうとはっ！！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57008.ko:
<voice 00110_00057008><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: ……끄아아악!?
　이게 어떻게 된 거죠!?
　제 환술이 깨지다니!!<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57008.zh-Hans:
<voice 00110_00057008><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>……啊啊啊啊？！
这是怎么回事！
我的幻术被破除了！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57008.zh-Hant:
<voice 00110_00057008><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>……嘎啊啊啊！？
不敢相信！
我的幻術竟然被人破了！！<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57009.en: <voice 00140_00057009><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>...Great Demon King... Madesagora.... My apologies...<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57009.ja:
<voice 00140_00057009><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>「……大魔王…マデサゴーラさま。
　申し訳……あり…せんで………ござ……。<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57009.ko:
<voice 00140_00057009><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>: ……대마왕… 마데사고라 님.
　죄송……합니…다……….<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57009.zh-Hans:
<voice 00140_00057009><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>……大魔王……马蒂桑贡拉大人，
万分……抱……歉……<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57009.zh-Hant:
<voice 00140_00057009><start_lip_sync m50091 _normal m00001>大魔王、馬德沙葛拉大人……
我……很抱……歉……<stop_lip_animation m50091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57010.en:
<voice 00330_00057010><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>We managed to beat him... If they had
done the prayer before we got here, we
would have been in big trouble.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57010.ja:
<voice 00330_00057010><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「なんとか　倒せたわね……。
　もし　私たちが来る前に　祈りの儀が
　おこなわれてたら　大変なことになっていたわ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57010.ko:
<voice 00330_00057010><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 간신히 쓰러뜨렸네…….
　만약 우리가 오기 전에 기도 의식을
　마쳤더라면 큰일 날 뻔했어.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57010.zh-Hans:
<voice 00330_00057010><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>总算是打倒了……
如果在我们来之前，就先举行过
祈祷仪式的话，那后果真是不堪设想。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57010.zh-Hant:
<voice 00330_00057010><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>總算打倒他了。
要是我們來之前
就舉行了祈禱儀式，那就糟了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57011.en:
<voice 00371_00057011><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Then let's hurry up and pour Hero's
power into Divine Crimsonite.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57011.ja:
<voice 00371_00057011><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　急いで　神の緋石に
　勇者のチカラを　注ぎ込むことにしましょう。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57011.ko:
<voice 00371_00057011><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그럼 어서 신의 붉은 돌에
　용사의 힘을 불어넣자.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57011.zh-Hans:
<voice 00371_00057011><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>赶快向神之绯石里
注入勇者之力吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57011.zh-Hant:
<voice 00371_00057011><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那我馬上把勇者的力量
注入神之緋石吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57012.en:
<voice 01220_00057012><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>...With that, the Divine Crimsonite here has regained its
ancient, divine power. Now, even Great Demon King
himself shouldn't be able to meddle with it.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57012.ja:
<voice 01220_00057012><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「……これで　ここの神の緋石は
　神代のチカラを取り戻したわ。
　もう　大魔王にも　手出しはできないはずよ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57012.ko:
<voice 01220_00057012><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: ……이걸로 이 신의 붉은 돌은
　신대의 힘을 되찾았어.
　이제 대마왕도 손댈 수 없을 거야.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57012.zh-Hans:
<voice 01220_00057012><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……这下这里的神之绯石
就恢复神代之力了。
大魔王也不能动这块绯石了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57012.zh-Hant:
<voice 01220_00057012><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>……這樣子，這裡的神之緋石
就恢復了神代之力。
大魔王應該也無法出手了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57013.en: <voice 01430_00057013><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>Gre-Great Priest is...!?<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57013.ja: <voice 01430_00057013><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「だっ　大神官さまは……！？<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57013.ko: <voice 01430_00057013><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 대, 대신관님은……!?<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57013.zh-Hans: <voice 01430_00057013><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>大、大神官阁下在哪？！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57013.zh-Hant: <voice 01430_00057013><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>大、大神官大人呢……！？<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57014.en:
The Great Priest was a monster in disguise. Rest assured, we have defeated it. Divine Crimsonite has
regained its power.
57014.ja:
<voice 01460_00057014><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「あの大神官さまは　魔物が化けていたのです。
　私たちが倒しましたので　ご安心ください。
　神の緋石も　チカラを取り戻しました。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57014.ko:
<voice 01460_00057014><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그 대신관님은 마물이 둔갑한 거였어요.
　저희가 물리쳤으니 걱정 마세요.
　신의 붉은 돌도 힘을 되찾았고요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57014.zh-Hans:
<voice 01460_00057014><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那个大神官阁下是怪物伪装的。
已经被我们打倒了，请放心。
神之绯石也恢复了力量。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57014.zh-Hant:
<voice 01460_00057014><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那位大神官大人變成了怪物。
我們已經打倒他了，請放心。
神之緋石也恢復力量了。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57015.en: <voice 01495_00057015><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>I see. That monster was...<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57015.ja: <voice 01495_00057015><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「そうですか。あれは　魔物が……。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57015.ko: <voice 01495_00057015><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 그렇군요, 그건 마물이…….<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57015.zh-Hans: <voice 01495_00057015><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>这样啊。那是怪物……<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57015.zh-Hant: <voice 01495_00057015><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>這樣啊，他是怪物嗎……<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57016.en:
<voice 01525_00057016><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>Then where is the real Grand Priest!?
This is terrible. I must go search for him!!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57016.ja:
<voice 01525_00057016><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「では　本物の大神官さまは　どこに！？
　大変だっ。探しにいかなくては！！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57016.ko:
<voice 01525_00057016><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 그럼 진짜 대신관님은 어디 계신 거지!?
　큰일이다, 어서 찾아야 해!!<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57016.zh-Hans:
<voice 01525_00057016><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>那真正的大神官阁下在哪里呢？！
不好。要赶快去找！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57016.zh-Hant:
<voice 01525_00057016><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>那真正的大神官大人去哪了！？
糟了！我得去找他才行！！<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57017.en:
<voice 01640_00057017><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>The enemy must have a lot of ideas to
use this kind of trick.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57017.ja:
<voice 01640_00057017><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「こんな手を使ってくるなんて
　敵も　いろいろと考えるものね……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57017.ko:
<voice 01640_00057017><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 이런 방법을 쓸 줄이야.
　적도 점점 수법이 교묘해지네…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57017.zh-Hans:
<voice 01640_00057017><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>居然会使用这种手段，
敌人也想了不少计策啊……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57017.zh-Hant:
<voice 01640_00057017><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>竟然耍這種手段，
敵人也真是用心良苦……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000200.en:
<voice 01720_29000200><start_lip_sync pr01 _normal m00001>Let's hurry up and find the real Grand
Priest.<stop_lip_animation pr01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000200.ja:
<voice 01720_29000200><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「本物の大神官さまを
　急いで　探しましょう。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000200.ko:
<voice 01720_29000200><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 어서 진짜 대신관님을
　찾아 보자.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000200.zh-Hans:
<voice 01720_29000200><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>赶快去找
真正的大神官阁下吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000200.zh-Hant:
<voice 01720_29000200><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>趕快去找
真正的大神官大人吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57020.en:
<voice 00050_00057020><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>...*sob* Grandpriest, I am so relieved
that you are safe.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57020.ja:
<voice 00050_00057020><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「……ううっ　大神官さま。
　本当に　ご無事で　安心しました。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57020.ko:
<voice 00050_00057020><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: ……으흑, 대신관님.
　무사하셔서 정말 다행입니다.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57020.zh-Hans:
<voice 00050_00057020><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>……呜呜，大神官阁下。
您没事我就放心了。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57020.zh-Hant:
<voice 00050_00057020><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>嗚嗚……大神官大人……
您沒事我就放心了。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57021.en: <voice 00115_00057021><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>I am sorry... I was just careless.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57021.ja:
<voice 00115_00057021><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「すまんかったのう……。
　わしが　油断しておったばかりに。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57021.ko:
<voice 00115_00057021><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 미안하군…….
　내가 방심한 탓에.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57021.zh-Hans:
<voice 00115_00057021><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>抱歉……
都是因为我大意了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57021.zh-Hant:
<voice 00115_00057021><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>抱歉啊……
是我太大意了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000202.en:
<voice 00185_29000202><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Ooh, <pc> and Hero Princess.
Juaro has told me all about your exploits.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000202.ja:
<voice 00185_29000202><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>と　勇者姫さまではないか。
　ジュアロから　そなたらの活躍は
　聞かせてもらったぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000202.ko:
<voice 00185_29000202><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 오오, {pc}|hpp(과,와) 용사 공주님이 아닌가.
　주알로에게 그대들의 활약상에 대해 들었네.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000202.zh-Hans:
<voice 00185_29000202><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>哦哦，这不是<pc>
和勇者公主殿下吗？
我从玖艾洛那里听说你们活跃的表现了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000202.zh-Hant:
<voice 00185_29000202><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>喔喔，這不是<pc>和勇者公主嗎？
我從玖艾洛那
聽到你們活躍的表現囉。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57023.en:
...I have shown you my shameful side. Suddenly, a monster broke into the house and put a strange spell on me so
that I couldn't move.
57023.ja:
<voice 00247_00057023><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……情けないところを　見せてしまったのう。
　突然　押し入ってきた魔物に　妙な術をかけられ
　身動きが取れんように　されてしまったんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57023.ko:
<voice 00247_00057023><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……한심한 모습을 보여 부끄럽군.
　갑자기 쳐들어온 마물이 괴이쩍은 주술을 걸어
　몸을 움직일 수 없게 됐지 뭔가.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57023.zh-Hans:
<voice 00247_00057023><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……真是让你见笑了。
突然闯进来的怪物向我施加了奇怪的法术，
我就动不了了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57023.zh-Hant:
<voice 00247_00057023><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……在你們面前丟臉了。
我被突然闖進來的怪物施了奇怪的法術，
然後就動不了了。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57024.en:
<voice 00277_00057024><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>Moreover, my image had been erased so
that no one could see me, and only now
have I finally been found.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57024.ja:
<voice 00277_00057024><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「その上　わしの姿が　誰にも見えぬよう
　消されておったらしく　今しがた
　やっと　見つけてもらえたというわけじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57024.ko:
<voice 00277_00057024><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 게다가 아무도 날 볼 수 없게
　만들었던 모양이라 조금 전에야
　겨우 발견된 참일세.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57024.zh-Hans:
<voice 00277_00057024><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>不仅如此，我整个人似乎都被隐藏了起来，
谁都看不见我。
就在刚才，才终于有人发现了我。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57024.zh-Hant:
<voice 00277_00057024><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>而且好像我消失了一樣，
誰也看不見我，
直到剛剛才終於被你們找到。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57025.en:
<voice 00397_00057025><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>...The Avatar of Alltrades in the Divine
Seat is said to have been a Divine
Crimsonite, and in fact such a story has been told in the temple.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57025.ja:
<voice 00397_00057025><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……天願の座にある　ダーマのご神体は
　神の緋石であったということじゃが
　じつは　このような話が　神殿に伝わっておる。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57025.ko:
<voice 00397_00057025><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……소원의 방에 있는 다마의 영물이
　신의 붉은 돌이었다고 들었네만
　실은 신전에 이런 얘기가 전해 내려온다네.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57025.zh-Hans:
<voice 00397_00057025><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……听说在天愿之座的达玛的
圣物就是神之绯石。
其实在神殿里流传着这样一个故事。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57025.zh-Hant:
<voice 00397_00057025><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……其實神殿裡一直流傳
在天願之座的聖物，
就是神之緋石的故事。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57026.en:
<voice 00492_00057026><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>In the age of the gods, the human god
Gran Zenith and Allmighty Alltrades
were good friends.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57026.ja:
<voice 00492_00057026><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「神の時代。人間の神グランゼニスと
　ダーマの神は　よき友人として
　親交を　深めていたという。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57026.ko:
<voice 00492_00057026><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 신의 시대, 인간 신 그랑제니스와
　다마 신은 좋은 벗으로서
　교분을 나눴다고 하더군.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57026.zh-Hans:
<voice 00492_00057026><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>在神的时代，人类之神古兰泽尼斯和
达玛神是好友，
交情很深。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57026.zh-Hant:
<voice 00492_00057026><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>在眾神的時代，人類之神古蘭捷尼斯和
達瑪之神是摯友，
感情十分要好。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57027.en:
<voice 00522_00057027><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>When the god Gran Zenith died, one of
the stones containing his power was
entrusted to Allmighty Alltrades.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57027.ja:
<voice 00522_00057027><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「グランゼニス神が　果てたとき
　そのチカラが込められた　石のひとつが
　ダーマの神に　託された。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57027.ko:
<voice 00522_00057027><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 그러다 그랑제니스 신이 사라졌을 때
　그 힘이 담긴 돌 하나가
　다마 신에게 맡겨졌지.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57027.zh-Hans:
<voice 00522_00057027><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>古兰泽尼斯神去世时，
注入了他力量的其中一块石头
被托付给了达玛神。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57027.zh-Hant:
<voice 00522_00057027><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>在古蘭捷尼斯神去世時，
注入其力量的其中一塊石頭
被託付給了達瑪之神。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57028.en:
<voice 00622_00057028><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>The Allmighty Alltrades named the
mountain where the stone lies Dharma,
and had the priests of the time build a temple there...<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57028.ja:
<voice 00622_00057028><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「その石が眠る山を　ダーマの神は
　霊峰ダーマと名づけ　当時の神官たちに
　神殿を建てさせ……<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57028.ko:
<voice 00622_00057028><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 다마 신은 그 돌이 잠들어 있는 산을
　영봉 다마라 명명하고
　당시의 신관들을 시켜 신전을 지은 후……<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57028.zh-Hans:
<voice 00622_00057028><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>达玛神将那块石头沉睡的山
命名为灵峰达玛，
并命当时的神官们建造了神殿。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57028.zh-Hant:
<voice 00622_00057028><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>石頭沉眠的山
被達瑪之神取名為靈峰達瑪，
當時的神官們便在此處建造神殿……<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57029.en:
<voice 00652_00057029><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>He was ordained to be the Avatar of
Alltrades and to protect it for all
eternity... That's what the legend says.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57029.ja:
<voice 00652_00057029><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「ダーマのご神体として　未来永劫
　守り続けるよう　神託を下された……。
　それが　言い伝えの内容じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57029.ko:
<voice 00652_00057029><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 다마의 영물로서 영원히
　지키라는 신탁을 남겼다…….
　이게 전승의 내용일세.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57029.zh-Hans:
<voice 00652_00057029><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>之后达玛神下达了神谕，让他们将石头
作为自己的圣物永远守护下去……
这就是传说的内容。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57029.zh-Hant:
<voice 00652_00057029><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>並下達神諭要將此物
作為達瑪的聖物永遠守護下去……
這就是傳說的內容。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57030.en:
<voice 00752_00057030><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>...Protecting Divine Crimsonite is
essentially the role of us Allmighty
Alltrades officers.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57030.ja:
<voice 00752_00057030><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「……神の緋石を守ることは　本来
　我々　ダーマの神官の役目なのじゃよ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57030.ko:
<voice 00752_00057030><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: ……이렇듯 신의 붉은 돌을 지키는 건
　원래 우리 다마 신관의 역할이라네.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57030.zh-Hans:
<voice 00752_00057030><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……守护神之绯石本来是
我们这些达玛神官的责任。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57030.zh-Hant:
<voice 00752_00057030><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>……守護神之緋石本就是
我們達瑪神官的工作。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57031.en:
<voice 00782_00057031><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>And yet, this time, we have to ask for
your help. We must be very sorry.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57031.ja:
<voice 00782_00057031><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「それなのに　今回は　そなたたちに
　助けてもらうことに　なってしまったのう。
　我々は　大いに　反省せねばならんな。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57031.ko:
<voice 00782_00057031><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 그런데 이번에는 그대들의
　도움을 받고 말았군.
　이번 일은 우리도 깊이 반성해야겠어.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57031.zh-Hans:
<voice 00782_00057031><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>但这次却麻烦你们帮忙。
我们要深刻地反省。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57031.zh-Hant:
<voice 00782_00057031><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>可這次
卻受到了你們的幫助。
我們必須好好反省。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57032.en:
<voice 00842_00057032><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001><pc>. You have done a great
job. I can't thank you enough, but
will you at least accept this?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57032.ja:
<voice 00842_00057032><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。本当に　よくやってくれた。
　そなたには　礼のしようもないが
　せめて　これを受け取ってはくれぬか。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57032.ko:
<voice 00842_00057032><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 정말 잘 싸워 주었네.
　그대에게 진 빚을 다 갚을 순 없겠지만
　하다못해 이거라도 받아 주지 않겠나?<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57032.zh-Hans:
<voice 00842_00057032><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001><pc>啊。你做的真的非常好。

57033.en:
<voice 00940_00057033><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>I have no idea what fate awaits you,
Hero's Ally. I pray for your safety
here.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57033.ja:
<voice 00940_00057033><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>「勇者の盟友たる　そなたの運命は
　この　わしにも　計り知れぬ。
　ここで　無事を祈っておるぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57033.ko:
<voice 00940_00057033><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>: 용사의 맹우인 그대의 운명은
　나조차 가늠하기 힘드네.
　여기서 그대의 안녕을 빌지.<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57033.zh-Hans:
<voice 00940_00057033><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>你是勇者的盟友，
你的命运我也无法预测。
我会在这里祈祷你的平安的。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57033.zh-Hant:
<voice 00940_00057033><start_lip_sync n02130 _normal m00001>身為勇者盟友的你，
就連我也無法預測你的命運。
我在此祈禱你能一路平安。<stop_lip_animation n02130 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57034.en:
<voice 00980_00057034><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>Let us also pray for the safety of
<pc> and the success of his
journey.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57034.ja:
<voice 00980_00057034><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>「我々も　祈りましょう。
　<pc>殿の　無事と旅の成功を。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57034.ko:
<voice 00980_00057034><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>: 저희도 기도하겠습니다.
　<pc> 공의 안녕과 여행의 성공을.<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57034.zh-Hans:
<voice 00980_00057034><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>我们也会祈祷的。
愿<pc>你一路平安，顺利完成任务。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57034.zh-Hant:
<voice 00980_00057034><start_lip_sync n02132 _normal m00001>我們也會祈禱的。
祈求<pc>平安無事，以及旅途順遂。<stop_lip_animation n02132 CLOSE_MOUTH>
